Title: Corruption: Italy vs. the Balkans
Introduction: The Corruption Perceptions Index ranks countries and territories based on how corrupt their public sector is perceived to be. A country or territory's score indicates the perceived level of public sector corruption on a scale of 0 - 100, where 0 means that a country is perceived as highly corrupt and 100 means it is perceived as very clean.
Legend text: Transparency International's Corruption Perceptions Index (CPI). The score indicates the perceived level of public sector corruption on a scale of 0 - 100
